page.title: 04HOME LIFE - AT 12 YRS OF AGE
page.content: I usually wake up at 6.45 am, get dressed into my uniform and pack my bag. I have my breakfast, cereal or toast. I leave for school at 8.35 am. I am one of the few pupils who walk to school, as I live in Northleach and go to Westwoods. My Dad is the only teacher who lives in Northleach, so I sometimes walk with him or my friend, Lucy Fulford, though more usually my brother Chris. I am in 1Q, there is also 1P etc. My favourite subjects are Art and English. I stay to School lunch and reach home at about 3.45 pm. There is always homework but most nights I do something like guides, piano and recorder lessons. I then go to bed at 9.15 pm.
